message.heading: Don't be so gullible, McFly. Got the place fixed up nice, though, McFly.

message.heading: Stella! Another one of these damn kids jumped in front of my car! Come on out here! Help me take him in the house!

message.heading: If my calculations are correct, when this baby hits 88 miles per hour... you're gonna see some serious shit.
